data.message: Jackie Massaro you know i got nothing but love, but... fuck school? Not a good message. Also fuck being a contributing member of society, fuck being educated, fuck your futurrrrre, lets see what else? Uh, also fuck any girlfriends, that you won't have, because most likely she wasn't going around saying fuck school and is emplyed, so I guess ironically this shirt is fitting, because if you're the type to wear some thing so dumb as to say fuck school, then this shirt is exactly FOR you....

replies.message: hahhahahahahaha, yes, i agree. like obviously a fan, but fuck school? like not everybody can just say fuck school and become worth millions of dollars becoming a rapper... so to all the other people, they should really be going back to school....
